R

RADS_PER_1DEG - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
Number of radians in one degree, equivalent approximately to Math.PI/180 (used to convert to radians)

Resources - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the codebase.

RINGS_DETECTED_STRING - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
To keep track of the rings color detected.
Rising_Edge() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicSensor
In this method, A rising edge is detected, its average theta is calculated, we then continue rotating in the same direction until a falling edge is detected, the average theta of the falling edge is then calculated.
rotateRobotBy(double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
Helper wrapper method to properly make the robot rotate by a certain angle.
